SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.controller

Class GamesManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.controller.GamesManager
public class GamesManager extends Object
Class representing the lobby controller, manager creation of games, adds players to games and deletes games.
